H3.text: According to legend, who was King Arthur's father. Ãœther

A4.text: Uther Pendragon was a legendary King of the Britons and father of King Arthur.

A5.text: Merlin magically disguises Uther to look like his enemy Gorlois, enabling Uther to sleep with Gorlois' wife Lady Igraine.
